1516705414_1EmrB8xSDYobVFSc3Kad1vx1EPaPR.body:
Could you add shuffle function or a default "Play all" shuffle playlist?
The idea is that I just want to listen to ZeroLSTN at any point and I can just hit play and start listening without doing too much work (finding songs, making a playlist).
It would also be nice if I could see how many songs does an album have (most I see have one) so that I don't have to go hunting for good albums.
